Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Forms a database of all individual Items.
    Since:
    Feb. 12, 2020
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    P. Link

      • manageItem

        public Item manageItem(java.lang.String name)
        Manages an item by decreasing its quantity and seeing if an order must be placed. Note that this implementation is better than the implementation in the video, as it employs better coherence (not requiring a decreaseItem function here).
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the item to manage/decrease
        Returns:
        The item being managed

      • decreaseQuantity

        public boolean decreaseQuantity(java.lang.String name)
        Decreases an item quantity, by name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the item to decrease the quantity of
        Returns:
        Whether the decrease was successful (i.e. whether the quantity was !=0 before).

      • placeOrder

        public void placeOrder(Item item)
        Places an order by generating an order line for a file, and adding the orderline if it's not null. Ignores if null.

      • getQuantity

        public int getQuantity(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the item quantity, by name.
